item.title: NextJS - Supabase - Prisma
item.description: ** Making a Free NextJS Front-end, SQL back-end with Migrations ** Is PHP Dead? It’s everywhere on the internet. Didn’t the know it all managers learn their lesson from Ruby on Rails. It’s gone. Dead. Latin. Spotify and Netflix are using it. But they are the only companies that can afford to hire a Ruby dev. Ruby was a flash in the pan. I did like Rails. Which Laravel stole from heavily and I love me some Laravel.
